subject: Kentucky Derby
Plagiarism
lead_paragraph: A freelance writer will no longer receive assignments from NBC Universal Sports after copying two passages from a 2002 episode of "The West Wing" in his script for a feature that preceded Saturday's Kentucky Derby.
snippet: A freelance writer will no longer receive assignments from NBC Universal Sports after copying two passages from a 2002 episode of "The West Wing" in his script for a feature that preceded Saturday's Kentucky Derby.
